originalText.text:
Vaishali has been working with my 5 year old son for about 3 months now at the Westchester location. Vaishali is so patient, kind, dedicated, and compassionate with children and their parents. I have seen so much positive growth and development with my son in a short timespan thanks to Vaishali’s wonderful work. He always looks forward to his sessions with Vaishali and feels a great sense of accomplishment when he progresses from week to week.
Thank you, Vaishali!!

text.text:

originalText.text: I have had the most amazing experience with Vaishali and her team since day one working with them. From the initial evaluation, Vaishali was thorough and sensitive. She shared with me very clearly a plan for my daughter of how to improve her fine motor skills and set expectations for what progress would look like. She also did a great jobbing pairing Joseph with my daughter for her sessions. He truly makes the time together fun and in just a few short weeks we saw progress. He continues to push her during their time together, but also does a great job of understanding what interests her to plan sessions around those interest to ensure she is fully engaged while also working with her to explore new things. Highly recommend Apple Blossom!

originalText.text:
Vaishali or Dr V as we call her has been an incredible occupational therapist for my son for well over a year.  She is an expert in her field and does a great job tailoring OT sessions to his mood.  She has a beautiful, pristine gym that has been incredible for building my son’s core strength and the improvements he has made in his time with Dr V have been amazing.  She easily adapted to virtual sessions as well and plays fun gross motor games like “the floor is lava” and creates engaging fine motor activities as well.  Vaishali also has a warm and patient manner with her clients and has incredible instinct with her treatment plans.  I will be forever grateful to her for all that she has done for my child and I recommend her highly to everyone.
I am updating this post as Dr V continues to amaze me...this is from yesterday...headstand contest, building Corp strength...there’s Dr V with her client... i hope the photo comes through...

originalText.text: We loved working with Vaishali for OT for my 3 year old son.  After meeting with a number of other disorganized OT centers & therapists, a fellow mom friend recommended Vaishali for us.  She is passionate about helping children and really helped my son with everything from balancing, sensory input, organizational motor planning and fine motor skills.  She was also able to engage him via Zoom for virtual therapy sessions.

originalText.text:
Vaishali is recommended by a friend and our experience turns out she is a fantastic SI certified therapist.
She evaluated my daughter in different ways and explain carefully on each aspect that my daughter performs well or not so well. She also gave us valuable suggestions to help my daughter improve.
Her office is equipped with a lot of fun and motivating activities. Vaishali was able to subtly teach my daughter and encourage her to learn skills while playing. My daughter loves to play over there.
Moreover, she is very responsive and always answers questions in a timely fashion.
We feel lucky to have her.
